name: Piraat
description:
[WORK IN PROGRESS]

You start as a dead pirat's skull.
You've come back to life because your precious treasure chest has been stolen.
It is your mission to take it back so you can rest in peace.

Controls :
Left Right arrows / move
Up arrow / jump
Space / shoot

Friends for a very long time, we always wanted to make something together that would use all our skills and learn new ones.

First collaborative project and certainly not the last !

Graphics and animations
Consumed Hardlip.

Game design and code
NeuroneZero.

Made with Unity.

Hardlip Consumed Flicker
